item.title: Shakira - Waka Waka - Key of D
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Waka Waka on the ukulele by Shakira. The chords used are D G A Bm.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Shakira - Try Everything - Key of C
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Try Everything on the ukulele by Shakira. The chords used are C F G Am.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Shakira - Try Everything - Key of C
item.description:
Only C, F, G!!! Intro strum rhythm (all down) is same as melody of the intro. Then simple DU pattern for most of the song.
Check out the website for the ukulele jam sessions I run via Fredonia Ukulele: https://sites.google.com/a/fredonia.e...
Check out my website for music teachers: https://sites.google.com/a/fredonia.e...
